thread.title: Chrissy Teigen Poses Topless For SI Swimsuit Issue
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen Poses Topless For SI Swimsuit Issue | The Daily Caller

author: Katie Jerkovich
title: Chrissy Teigen Poses Topless For SI Swimsuit Issue
text:
NEW YORK, NY - OCTOBER 17: Chrissy Teigen attends the God's Love We Deliver Golden Heart Awards on October 17, 2016 in New York City. (Photo by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Michael Kors)    5456893 Chrissy Teigen is back in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue and her fans will not be disappointed by the results.
The 31-year-old swimsuit model graces the pages of the coveted issue only 10 months after giving birth to her first child. In a video published Tuesday by People magazine from her photo shoot for the 2017 issue, Teigen talks about getting back to work and jokes that it’s “stupidly painful” posing all day with one’s butt popped out. (RELATED: Chrissy Teigen Posts Completely Nude Photo For Friend’s Birthday[PHOTOS]) 
WATCH: 

“It’s been awhile since I’ve done anything swimsuit,” Teigen said on the video. “I haven’t shot since baby. But of course you know that [SI Swimsuit editor] MJ [Day] and everyone at Sports Illustrated in general is going to embrace your body no matter what’s happening and embrace the changes.” (RELATED: Chrissy Teigen Calls Donald Trump’s ‘Outsider’ Platform Into Question) 
“She showed up telling me she would only shoot one pieces, and if I could throw a blanket over the top of her, that would be great,” the magazine editor MJ Day responded. “I think she surprised herself on this trip, because I don’t think she was seeing herself quite the way we were seeing her.”
Last week, the magazine shared another video from the shoot in which the model poses in extremely small swimsuits that show off almost all of her body.
WATCH:
